Button.name: $parentButton
Button.text: FIRST TIME RUNNING ADDON, CLICK HERE TO RELOAD!

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else number = number - 1 end this:SetText(number) CheckResizeInput()
local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else number = number - 1 end this:SetText(number) CheckExtendInput(number)
local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else if(number == "0")then number = 0 else number = number - 1 end end this:SetText(number) CheckResizeInput()
local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else if(number == "0")then number = 0 else number = number - 1 end end this:SetText(number) CheckResizeInput()
local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else if(number == "0")then number = 0 else number = number - 1 end end this:SetText(number) CheckPortraitScaleChange()
local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else if(number == "0")then number = 0 else number = number - 1 end end this:SetText(number) ChangeCastbarAlignment()
local number = this:GetText() if(arg1 == 1)then number = number + 1 else if(number == "0")then number = 0 else number = number - 1 end end this:SetText(number) ChangeHPThreshold()

FontString.name: $parentBuffText
FontString.text: Buffs Top right (disable to move with MoveAnything), reload after disabling.

FontString.name: $parentMultibarText
FontString.text: !!! BETA !!! Enable Horizontal Multibar. Please use MoveAnything to align the Multibars

FontString.name: $parentEnableCustomizeDisabledText
FontString.text: Disable customize settings and reload UI to change theme

Scripts.OnLoad:
this:Hide() this:SetBackdrop({ bgFile = "Interface/Tooltips/UI-Tooltip-Background", edgeFile="Interface/DialogFrame/UI-DialogBox-Border", edgeSize="24", insets = { left = 4, right = 4, top = 4, bottom = 4 } }) this:SetBackdropColor(0.45, 0.45, 0.45, 1) WIIIUI_menuUIScaleText:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", WIIIUI_menuEditboxUIScale, "CENTER", -75, 45) WIIIUI_menuPortraitScaleText:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", WIIIUI_menuEditboxPortraitScale, "CENTER", -40, 45) WIIIUI_menuExtendRightText:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", WIIIUI_menuEditboxExtendBottomRight, "TOPLEFT", -20, 15) WIIIUI_menuRestedXPText:SetPoint("TOP", WIIIUI_menu, "TOP", -115, -240) WIIIUI_menuTopLeftIconText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menu, "BOTTOMLEFT", 85, 272) WIIIUI_menuTopRightIconText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menu, "BOTTOMLEFT", 377, 272) WIIIUI_menuBottomRightIconText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menu, "BOTTOMLEFT", 359, 180) WIIIUI_menuAlignCastbarText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menuEditboxCastbarAlignment, "BOTTOMLEFT", -65, 35) WIIIUI_menuHPThresholdText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menuEditboxHPThreshold, "BOTTOMLEFT", -60, 35) WIIIUI_menuBuffText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menuCheckButtonBuff, "BOTTOMLEFT", -80, 35) WIIIUI_menuPortraitPos:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", WIIIUI_menuEditboxUIScale, "CENTER", 315, 55) WIIIUI_menuMultibarText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menu, "TOPRIGHT", -250, -145) WIIIUI_menuEnableCustomizeText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menuCheckButtonEnableCustomize, "CENTER", -20, -3) WIIIUI_menuEnableCustomizeDisabledText:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", WIIIUI_menu, "TOPLEFT", 100, -100)
WIIIUI_generalTab:Hide() WIIIUI_customizeTab:Hide()
Scripts.OnKeyDown: if(arg1 == "ESCAPE") then this:Hide() AlignUI() else return end

Scripts.OnShow: WIIIUI_infoBox:SetWidth(300) WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", WIIIUI_infoBox, 12, -12) WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetJustifyH("LEFT") WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetJustifyV("TOP") WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetWidth(276) WIIIUI_infoBox:SetHeight( (WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:GetHeight() + 12 + 10) )

Scripts.OnEnter:
WIIIUI_xpCurrLevel:SetText("XP "..UnitXP("player").." / "..UnitXPMax("player")) local xpPercentage = string.format("%.2f %%", UnitXP('player') / UnitXPMax('player') * 100) local xpPercentageLeft = string.format("%.2f %%", 100 - (UnitXP('player') / UnitXPMax('player') * 100)) WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetText("|cffffd100Experience required to level up:|r "..UnitXPMax("player").."
" .."|cffffd100Experience until next level:|r "..(UnitXPMax("player") - UnitXP("player")).." ("..xpPercentageLeft..")".."
" .."|cffffd100Current Experience:|r "..UnitXP("player").." ("..xpPercentage..")".."
" .."|cffffd100Rested Experience:|r "..(GetXPExhaustion() or 0) ) WIIIUI_infoBox:SetPoint("CENTER", WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame, 0, WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame:GetHeight() + 30) WIIIUI_infoBox:Show()

local lowDmg, highDmg, offLowDmg, offHiDmg, posBuff, negBuff, percentMod = UnitDamage("player") local attackSpeed, attackSpeedOffhand = string.format("%.2f", UnitAttackSpeed('player'))
local speed, hiDmg, posBuff, percent local itemType local ammoSlot, ammoLeft local attackSpeedOffhand local dps local text local itemLink, itemString, stringEnd local sp, hp local secondaryPowers
if(attackSpeedOffhand == nil)then attackSpeedOffhand = 0 end
dps = ((floor(lowDmg) + ceil(highDmg))/2) / attackSpeed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps)
text = "|cffffd100Main Hand Damage:|r "..floor(lowDmg).." - "..ceil(highDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..attackSpeed.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
"
if(OffhandHasWeapon() ~= nil)then dps = ((floor(offLowDmg) + ceil(offHiDmg))/2) / attackSpeed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps) text = text.."
|cffffd100Offhand damage:|r "..floor(offLowDmg).." - "..ceil(offHiDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..attackSpeedOffhand.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
" end
itemLink = GetInventoryItemLink("player", 18) or nil if(itemLink ~= nil) then itemString, stringEnd = string.find(itemLink, "item[%-?%d:]+") itemLink = string.sub(itemLink, itemString, stringEnd) __, __, __, __, __, itemType, __, __, __, __, __ = GetItemInfo(itemLink) else itemType="none" end
if(itemType == "Bows" or itemType == "Guns" or itemType == "Crossbows" or itemType == "Thrown" or itemType == "Wands") then
ammoSlot = CharacterAmmoSlot:GetID(); local rangedCount = GetInventoryItemCount("player", CharacterRangedSlot:GetID()); if (rangedCount > 1) then ammoSlot = CharacterRangedSlot:GetID(); end ammoLeft = GetInventoryItemCount("player", ammoSlot);
speed, lowDmg, hiDmg, posBuff, negBuff, percent = UnitRangedDamage("player") speed = string.format("%.2f", speed) dps = ((floor(lowDmg) + ceil(hiDmg))/2) / speed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps) text = text.."
|cffffd100Ranged damage:|r "..floor(lowDmg).." - "..ceil(hiDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..speed.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
" .."|cffffd100Ammo left:|r "..ammoLeft.."
" end
if(wc3UI_Options.weaponIconSelected1 == 98) then sp = GetSpellpowerValue() hp = GetHealingpowerValue() text = tostring( sp + hp )
text = "|cffffd100Total healing power:|r "..tostring(sp + hp).."
" .."|cffffd100Raw healing power:|r "..tostring(hp).."
" .."|cffffd100Healing from spell power:|r "..tostring(sp).."
"
elseif(wc3UI_Options.weaponIconSelected1 == 99) then sp, secondaryPowers = GetSpellpowerValue() text = tostring(secondaryPowers['frost'])
text = "|cffffd100Spell power:|r "..tostring(sp).."
" .."
|cffffd100Extra power (add with Spell power to get sum)|r
" .."|cffffd100Example: Fire (15) + Spell power (30) = 45 for fire spells.|r

" .."|cffffd100Arcane:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['arcane']).."
" .."|cffffd100Fire:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['fire']).."
" .."|cffffd100Frost:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['frost']).."
" .."|cffffd100Holy:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['holy']).."
" .."|cffffd100Nature:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['nature']).."
" .."|cffffd100Shadow:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['shadow']).."
" end
WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetText(text) WIIIUI_infoBox:SetPoint("CENTER", WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame, 0, 50) WIIIUI_infoBox:Show()

local lowDmg, highDmg, offLowDmg, offHiDmg, posBuff, negBuff, percentMod = UnitDamage("player") local attackSpeed, attackSpeedOffhand = string.format("%.2f", UnitAttackSpeed('player'))
local speed, hiDmg, posBuff, percent local itemType local ammoSlot, ammoLeft local attackSpeedOffhand local dps local text local itemLink, itemString, stringEnd local sp, hp local secondaryPowers
if(attackSpeedOffhand == nil)then attackSpeedOffhand = 0 end
dps = ((floor(lowDmg) + ceil(highDmg))/2) / attackSpeed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps)
text = "|cffffd100Main Hand Damage:|r "..floor(lowDmg).." - "..ceil(highDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..attackSpeed.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
"
if(OffhandHasWeapon() ~= nil)then dps = ((floor(offLowDmg) + ceil(offHiDmg))/2) / attackSpeed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps) text = text.."
|cffffd100Offhand damage:|r "..floor(offLowDmg).." - "..ceil(offHiDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..attackSpeedOffhand.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
" end
itemLink = GetInventoryItemLink("player", 18) or nil if(itemLink ~= nil) then itemString, stringEnd = string.find(itemLink, "item[%-?%d:]+") itemLink = string.sub(itemLink, itemString, stringEnd) __, __, __, __, __, itemType, __, __, __, __, __ = GetItemInfo(itemLink) else itemType="none" end
if(itemType == "Bows" or itemType == "Guns" or itemType == "Crossbows" or itemType == "Thrown" or itemType == "Wands") then
ammoSlot = CharacterAmmoSlot:GetID(); local rangedCount = GetInventoryItemCount("player", CharacterRangedSlot:GetID()); if (rangedCount > 1) then ammoSlot = CharacterRangedSlot:GetID(); end ammoLeft = GetInventoryItemCount("player", ammoSlot);
speed, lowDmg, hiDmg, posBuff, negBuff, percent = UnitRangedDamage("player") speed = string.format("%.2f", speed) dps = ((floor(lowDmg) + ceil(hiDmg))/2) / speed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps) text = text.."
|cffffd100Ranged damage:|r "..floor(lowDmg).." - "..ceil(hiDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..speed.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
" .."|cffffd100Ammo left:|r "..ammoLeft.."
" end
if(wc3UI_Options.weaponIconSelected2 == 98) then sp = GetSpellpowerValue() hp = GetHealingpowerValue() text = tostring( sp + hp )
text = "|cffffd100Total healing power:|r "..tostring(sp + hp).."
" .."|cffffd100Raw healing power:|r "..tostring(hp).."
" .."|cffffd100Healing from spell power:|r "..tostring(sp).."
"
elseif(wc3UI_Options.weaponIconSelected2 == 99) then sp, secondaryPowers = GetSpellpowerValue() text = tostring(secondaryPowers['frost'])
text = "|cffffd100Spell power:|r "..tostring(sp).."
" .."
|cffffd100Extra power (add with Spell power to get sum)|r
" .."|cffffd100Example: Fire (15) + Spell power (30) = 45 for fire spells.|r

" .."|cffffd100Arcane:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['arcane']).."
" .."|cffffd100Fire:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['fire']).."
" .."|cffffd100Frost:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['frost']).."
" .."|cffffd100Holy:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['holy']).."
" .."|cffffd100Nature:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['nature']).."
" .."|cffffd100Shadow:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['shadow']).."
" end
WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetText(text) WIIIUI_infoBox:SetPoint("CENTER", WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame, 0, 50) WIIIUI_infoBox:Show()

local lowDmg, highDmg, offLowDmg, offHiDmg, posBuff, negBuff, percentMod = UnitDamage("player") local attackSpeed, attackSpeedOffhand = string.format("%.2f", UnitAttackSpeed('player'))
local speed, hiDmg, posBuff, percent local itemType local ammoSlot, ammoLeft local attackSpeedOffhand local dps local text local itemLink, itemString, stringEnd local sp, hp local secondaryPowers
if(attackSpeedOffhand == nil)then attackSpeedOffhand = 0 end
dps = ((floor(lowDmg) + ceil(highDmg))/2) / attackSpeed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps)
text = "|cffffd100Main Hand Damage:|r "..floor(lowDmg).." - "..ceil(highDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..attackSpeed.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
"
if(OffhandHasWeapon() ~= nil)then dps = ((floor(offLowDmg) + ceil(offHiDmg))/2) / attackSpeed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps) text = text.."
|cffffd100Offhand damage:|r "..floor(offLowDmg).." - "..ceil(offHiDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..attackSpeedOffhand.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
" end
itemLink = GetInventoryItemLink("player", 18) or nil if(itemLink ~= nil) then itemString, stringEnd = string.find(itemLink, "item[%-?%d:]+") itemLink = string.sub(itemLink, itemString, stringEnd) __, __, __, __, __, itemType, __, __, __, __, __ = GetItemInfo(itemLink) else itemType="none" end
if(itemType == "Bows" or itemType == "Guns" or itemType == "Crossbows" or itemType == "Thrown" or itemType == "Wands") then
ammoSlot = CharacterAmmoSlot:GetID(); local rangedCount = GetInventoryItemCount("player", CharacterRangedSlot:GetID()); if (rangedCount > 1) then ammoSlot = CharacterRangedSlot:GetID(); end ammoLeft = GetInventoryItemCount("player", ammoSlot);
speed, lowDmg, hiDmg, posBuff, negBuff, percent = UnitRangedDamage("player") speed = string.format("%.2f", speed) dps = ((floor(lowDmg) + ceil(hiDmg))/2) / speed dps = string.format("%.2f", dps) text = text.."
|cffffd100Ranged damage:|r "..floor(lowDmg).." - "..ceil(hiDmg).."
" .."|cffffd100Attack Speed:|r "..speed.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage per second:|r "..dps.."
" .."|cffffd100Ammo left:|r "..ammoLeft.."
" end
if(wc3UI_Options.weaponIconSelected3 == 98) then sp = GetSpellpowerValue() hp = GetHealingpowerValue() text = tostring( sp + hp )
text = "|cffffd100Total healing power:|r "..tostring(sp + hp).."
" .."|cffffd100Raw healing power:|r "..tostring(hp).."
" .."|cffffd100Healing from spell power:|r "..tostring(sp).."
"
elseif(wc3UI_Options.weaponIconSelected3 == 99) then sp, secondaryPowers = GetSpellpowerValue() text = tostring(secondaryPowers['frost'])
text = "|cffffd100Spell power:|r "..tostring(sp).."
" .."
|cffffd100Extra power (add with Spell power to get sum)|r
" .."|cffffd100Example: Fire (15) + Spell power (30) = 45 for fire spells.|r

" .."|cffffd100Arcane:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['arcane']).."
" .."|cffffd100Fire:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['fire']).."
" .."|cffffd100Frost:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['frost']).."
" .."|cffffd100Holy:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['holy']).."
" .."|cffffd100Nature:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['nature']).."
" .."|cffffd100Shadow:|r "..tostring(secondaryPowers['shadow']).."
" end
WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetText(text) WIIIUI_infoBox:SetPoint("CENTER", WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame, 0, 50) WIIIUI_infoBox:Show()

local base, effectiveArmor, armor, posBuff, negBuff = UnitArmor("player") local uLvl = UnitLevel("player")
local dr local totalArcane, totalFire, totalNature, totalFrost, totalShadow local dodgeChance, parryChance, blockChance
local latency
__, __, latency = GetNetStats()
if( uLvl ~= 60 ) then dr = effectiveArmor / (effectiveArmor + 400 + 85 * uLvl) else dr = effectiveArmor / (effectiveArmor + 400 + 85 * (uLvl + 4.5 * (uLvl - 59))) end dr = string.format("%.1f%%", dr * 100)
__, totalArcane, __, __ = UnitResistance("player", 1) __, totalFire, __, __ = UnitResistance("player", 2) __, totalNature, __, __ = UnitResistance("player", 3) __, totalFrost, __, __ = UnitResistance("player", 4) __, totalShadow, __, __ = UnitResistance("player", 5)
dodgeChance = string.format("%.2f%%", GetDodgeChance()) parryChance = string.format("%.2f%%", GetParryChance()) blockChance = string.format("%.2f%%", GetBlockChance())
WIIIUI_infoBox_Text:SetText("|cffffd100Base Armor:|r "..base.."
" .."|cffffd100Bonus Armor:|r "..(effectiveArmor - base).."
" .."|cffffd100Total Armor:|r "..effectiveArmor.."
" .."|cffffd100Damage reduced %:|r "..dr.."

" .."|cffffd100Dodge chance:|r "..dodgeChance.."
" .."|cffffd100Parry chance:|r "..parryChance.."
" .."|cffffd100Block chance:|r "..blockChance.."

" .."|cffffd100Arcane Resistance:|r "..totalArcane.."
" .."|cffffd100Fire Resistance:|r "..totalFire.."
" .."|cffffd100Nature Resistance:|r "..totalNature.."
" .."|cffffd100Frost Resistance:|r "..totalFrost.."
" .."|cffffd100Shadow Resistance:|r "..totalShadow.."

" .."|cffffd100Latency (ms):|r "..latency ) WIIIUI_infoBox:SetPoint("CENTER", WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame, 0, WIIIUI_xpHoverFrame:GetHeight() + 50)
WIIIUI_infoBox:Show()
